prompt:
The image showcases an Indian-style floor pattern with intricate diamond shapes and geometric designs reminiscent of traditional South Asian architectural aesthetics. The material appears to be a type of tile or stone, characterized by the use of colorful marbles in a mosaic pattern. These marbles are set within large black diamonds, creating a contrast that highlights their beauty.

The design is symmetrical and exhibits a sense of opulence with the alternating colors adding depth to the floor. The overall visual aesthetic is one of elegance and sophistication, with the rich tapestry of marble contributing to an atmosphere of grandeur.
